messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Thanks to a rise in the value of sandals, we've made enough credits to buy a station from Nanotrasen. Welcome to the Wizards Federation, I sure hope you all enjoy being apprentices.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: please desist and do not taunt our nuclear device as we have been getting reports that this is becomming a problem

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: hey get off our comms you pesky wizzards

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: No go fuck yourselves and drink bleach

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: why you so mean to me

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
due to you insulting us so much we will deploy our anti wizzard tactics............     
RELEASE THE PIRATES!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: cookies are the cure to the darkness in your heart

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Unidentified armed ship detected near the station.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: the floor isin't lava it's just your IMAGINATION!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Atmospherics alert

The scrubbers network is experiencing a backpressure surge. Some ejection of contents may occur.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Wizards are fucking up the station stop recalling the fucking shuttle
